Name: Race To Sanity
About the game: Survive in the craziest places to get to your sanity. This game is racing style with physically real ragdoll. A super fun game for you to test the limits of your reflexes. FEATURES : Thematic places. Random level generator. Real physics. Super funny ragdoll. Simple and fun. A metaphor about madness.
